ygData.subject: Re: The Vok
ygData.msgSnippet: Meteara ignited her jets and flew after him. Meteara: I disagree. We must not intervene for now. If you get involved in this battle, I will slay you myself.

Meteara ignited her jets and flew after him.

Meteara: I disagree. We must not intervene for now. If you get 
involved in this battle, I will slay you myself. However, if you see 
things from afar, I will do nothing. 

She kept looking at her display and suddenly saw something else...

Meteara: No... Firaxis, get in the battle. Which side do we take?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Firaxis::
>        He slows down but doesn't stop.  "I understand completely.  
But I'd 
> like to see how this battle will play out.  I'm somewhat of a 
connoisseur of 
> battles.  I hope you can understand."
